description: Exponent of 3 (value of j) in n-th number of form 2^i*3^j (see A003586).
links: Franklin T. Adams-Watters and Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000, first 1000 terms by Franklin T. Adams-Watters
prog: (Haskell)a022329 n = a022329_list !! (n-1)-- Where a022329_list is defined in A022328.-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 19 2015, May 16 2015
crossrefs: Cf. A003586, A022328, A134583. - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Mar 19 2009
